meta.title: Privacy Policy - MapMyRoots | Your Data Stays Private
meta.description: MapMyRoots Privacy Policy - Learn how we protect your family tree data and personal information. Your data stays on your device, we never store it on our servers.

og.title: Privacy Policy - MapMyRoots
og.description: MapMyRoots Privacy Policy - Your data stays on your device. Learn about our privacy-first approach to family tree building.

tldr.title: TL;DR - Privacy First:
tldr.content: Your family tree data never leaves your device. It's stored locally in your browser using LocalStorage. We don't have access to your data, and we can't see it. You're in complete control.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: MapMyRoots ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle information when you use our free family tree builder application at mapmyroots.com (the "Service").

family_tree.title: 2.1 Family Tree Data
family_tree.content: All family tree data you create (names, dates, relationships, photos, notes) is stored locally on your device using browser LocalStorage technology. This data:
points: Never leaves your device or browser
Is not uploaded to our servers
Cannot be accessed by us or any third party
Remains under your complete control
Can be exported and deleted at any time

analytics.title: 2.2 Analytics Data
analytics.content: We use Google Tag Manager and Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage statistics to help us improve the Service. This includes:
points: Pages visited
Features used
Time spent on site
Device type and browser
General location (country/city level)
analytics.note: Important: Analytics data does not include any personal information from your family tree.

cookies.title: 2.3 Cookies
cookies.content: We use the following types of cookies:

essential.title: Essential Cookies:
essential.content: Required for the Service to function (e.g., saving your language preference)

cookies.analytics_content: Google Analytics cookies to understand how you use the Service

no_account.title: 3. No Account Required
no_account.content: MapMyRoots does not require you to create an account or provide any personal information such as:
points: Email address
Name
Payment information
Phone number
no_account.anonymous: You can use the Service completely anonymously.

data_security.title: 4. Data Security
data_security.content: Since your family tree data is stored locally on your device:
points: You are responsible for securing your device
We recommend regularly exporting your family tree data as backup
Your data is subject to your browser's security and storage policies
Clearing your browser data will delete your family tree

third_party.title: 5. Third-Party Services
third_party.content: We use the following third-party services:

google.title: Google Analytics:
google.content: For anonymous usage statistics. See Google's Privacy Policy

fonts.title: Google Fonts:
fonts.content: For typography. See Google Fonts Privacy

your_rights.title: 6. Your Rights
your_rights.intro: You have complete control over your data:

access.title: Access:
access.content: View your data anytime in the application

export.title: Export:
export.content: Download your family tree data in JSON, PDF, or image formats

delete.title: Delete:
delete.content: Clear all data using the "Clear All Data" button in settings

modify.title: Modify:
modify.content: Edit any information in your family tree at any time

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.content: MapMyRoots does not knowingly collect any personal information from users. Since we don't collect personal data, users of all ages can use the Service. However, we recommend parental supervision for users under 13.

international.title: 8. International Users
international.content: MapMyRoots is available worldwide. Since your data is stored locally on your device, it never crosses international borders through our Service. Analytics data processed by Google may be transferred internationally in accordance with Google's privacy policies.

data_retention.title: 9. Data Retention
data_retention.content: Your family tree data remains on your device until you:
points: Clear your browser's LocalStorage
Use the "Clear All Data" feature in the application
Uninstall your browser
data_retention.export: We strongly recommend exporting your data regularly to prevent accidental loss.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by updating the "Last Updated" date at the top of this policy. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

gdpr.title: 11. GDPR Compliance
gdpr.content: For users in the European Union, we comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):
points: Data Minimization: We only process the minimum data necessary (anonymous analytics)
User Control: You have complete control over your family tree data
Transparency: This policy clearly explains our data practices
Consent: By using our Service, you consent to analytics as described

ccpa.title: 12. California Privacy Rights (CCPA)
ccpa.content: MapMyRoots does not sell personal information. California residents have the right to:
points: Know what personal data is collected (none from your family tree)
Request deletion of personal data
Opt-out of data sales (we don't sell data)

contact.title: 13. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

meta.title: About Us - MapMyRoots | Free Family Tree Builder
meta.description: Learn about MapMyRoots - our mission to make family history preservation accessible to everyone through free, privacy-focused family tree software.

hero.title: About MapMyRoots
hero.subtitle: Making family history preservation accessible, free, and privacy-focused for everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To empower families worldwide to create, visualize, and preserve their family histories without barriers. We believe that documenting your heritage should be free, simple, and private - accessible to everyone, not just those who can afford expensive genealogy software.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: MapMyRoots was born from a simple frustration: why is creating a family tree so expensive and complicated? Most genealogy services charge monthly fees, lock your data behind paywalls, and make the process overwhelming for beginners.
story.paragraph2: We created MapMyRoots to solve this problem. Launched in 2023, our platform provides a completely free, intuitive family tree builder that respects your privacy. Your data stays on your device - we never see it, we never store it, and we never sell it.
story.paragraph3: Since our launch, over 15,000 families have used MapMyRoots to preserve their heritage. From students completing school projects to grandparents documenting multiple generations, our tool serves families worldwide in their journey to understand where they come from.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.content: Your family tree data never leaves your device. We use browser LocalStorage to keep everything private and secure. No servers, no databases, no data collection - just you and your family history.

free.title: 100% Free Forever
free.content: No subscriptions, no premium tiers, no hidden costs. All features are free and always will be. Family history preservation shouldn't require a monthly payment.

simple.title: Simple & Intuitive
simple.content: We focus on making family tree creation easy for everyone. Drag-and-drop interface, visual canvas, and straightforward controls mean you can start building immediately - no training required.

accessible.title: Accessible to All
accessible.content: No registration required. Works on any device with a browser. Available in multiple languages. We believe everyone should be able to document their family story, regardless of technical skill or resources.

beautiful.title: Beautiful Design
beautiful.content: Your family history deserves to be presented beautifully. Our interactive canvas, customizable styles, and high-resolution exports make your family trees stunning works of art.

ownership.title: Your Data, Your Control
ownership.content: Export your family tree anytime in multiple formats (JSON, PDF, images). No vendor lock-in, no restrictions. Your data belongs to you, period.

why_free.title: Why Is MapMyRoots Free?
why_free.paragraph1: Great question! We believe family history preservation is a fundamental human activity that shouldn't be monetized. Unlike other genealogy services, we don't charge because:
why_free.reason1: Privacy-focused architecture: Since your data stays on your device, we don't need expensive servers or databases
why_free.reason2: No historical records: We focus on tree visualization, not genealogical research databases
why_free.reason3: Sustainable model: Our lean operation and efficient technology keep costs minimal
why_free.reason4: Community-driven: We're committed to serving families, not shareholders
why_free.paragraph2: We will never introduce paid features, subscriptions, or premium tiers. MapMyRoots will remain 100% free, forever.

technology.title: Our Technology
technology.paragraph1: MapMyRoots is built with modern web technologies to ensure a fast, secure, and reliable experience:
technology.canvas: HTML5 Canvas: Smooth, responsive family tree visualization
technology.localstorage: LocalStorage API: Secure, local data storage on your device
technology.responsive: Responsive Design: Works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile
technology.export: Advanced Export: High-resolution PNG, PDF, and JSON formats
technology.i18n: Internationalization: Multi-language support for global accessibility

cta.title: Start Your Family Tree Today
cta.content: Join over 15,000 families who trust MapMyRoots to preserve their family history. No registration required, completely free, and your data stays private.

faq_expansion.note: These are the 9 new FAQ questions added to index.html

questions.question: Can I import data from Ancestry.com or other services?
questions.answer: Currently, MapMyRoots doesn't support direct imports from other services. However, if you have a GEDCOM file from another genealogy service, you can manually enter the information into MapMyRoots. We're working on adding GEDCOM import functionality in future updates.

questions.question: Can I add photos to my family tree?
questions.answer: Photo support is currently in development. For now, you can add comprehensive text information including names, dates, relationships, and notes for each family member.

questions.question: How do I print my family tree?
questions.answer: You can export your family tree as a high-resolution PNG or PDF file using the export menu in the builder. These formats are perfect for printing at any size, from standard paper to large format posters for family reunions.

questions.question: How do I back up my family tree data?
questions.answer: Regular backups are essential! Use the export feature to download your family tree as a JSON file. Save this file to your computer, cloud storage, or USB drive. You can reload it anytime using the import feature.

questions.question: What browsers does MapMyRoots support?
questions.answer: MapMyRoots works on all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend using the latest version of your preferred browser for the best experience.

questions.question: Can I share my family tree with relatives?
questions.answer: Yes! Export your family tree as an image, PDF, or JSON file and share it via email, cloud storage, or messaging apps. Recipients can view images/PDFs directly or import the JSON file into their own MapMyRoots to continue editing.

questions.question: Is my family data private and secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Your family tree data is stored locally on your device using browser LocalStorage. It never leaves your device and we never see or access it. You have complete privacy and control over your family information.

questions.question: Can multiple people work on the same family tree?
questions.answer: While real-time collaboration isn't currently supported, you can share your family tree JSON file with others. They can import it, make changes, and send it back. You can then merge the updates into your version.
